dcterms:description: A dataset constructed from Wikipedia pages and expert knowledge from political think tanks, specifically AFL-CIO and Heritage Action, containing social context information about political actors.
dcterms:title: Political Actors Dataset

dcterms:creator: Johannes Kiesel
Maria Mestre
Rishabh Shukla
Emmanuel Vincent
Payam Adineh
David Corney
Benno Stein
Martin Potthast
dcterms:description: A dataset used for hyperpartisan news detection, containing labeled news articles.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2019 Task 4 Dataset

dcterms:creator: Chang Li
Dan Goldwasser
dcterms:description: A dataset for political perspective detection that encodes social information using graph convolutional networks.
dcterms:title: Political Perspective Detection Dataset

dcterms:creator: Xinyi Mou
Zhongyu Wei
Lei Chen
Shangyi Ning
Yancheng He
Changjian Jiang
Xuan-Jing Huang
dcterms:description: A dataset used for predicting roll call votes based on legislators' public statements and voting behavior.
dcterms:title: Roll Call Vote Prediction Dataset

dcterms:description: Scores obtained from the AFL-CIO and Heritage Action political think tanks, providing expert evaluations of political actors.
dcterms:title: Expert Knowledge Scores from AFL-CIO and Heritage Action
